roleset.name: to make dirty

example.name: transitive
example.text: The March 24 oil spill soiled hundreds of miles of shoreline along Alaska 's southern coast and wreaked havoc with wildlife and the fishing industry .
example.arg: hundreds of miles of shoreline along Alaska 's southern coast

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: Even if he had given up the names of only five or ten of his peers, his soiling of the reputations of the innocent was inexcusable.
example.arg: of the reputations of the innocent

roleset.note: SOIL-V NOTES: Based on survey of sentences in WSJ. Member of VNcls fill-9.8. (from soil.01-v)
